promptVersions.body:
Need a refresher on JIRA Child Case / Ticket Creation and Communication? Screensteps in Salesforce has it covered!


  • Search for "JIRA Child Case" in Screensteps if you need a guide for getting started


  • When you select "JIRA Child Case" in a parent case, you'll see the Screensteps bell icon on the right of the screen. Click it for a live guide on creating the JIRA Child Case and ticket.


  • When you're viewing a JIRA Child Case after creation, you'll see the Screensteps bell icon on the right of the screen. Click it for a live guide on creating JIRA Tickets and communicating to PRKS through Case Comments.
promptVersions.title: Screensteps JIRA Child Case Guides
promptVersions.videoLink: https://app.box.com/embed/s/dr02fkihzhhnvcws3ee7oh9cjhi6kw21?sortColumn=date&view=list" width="800" height="550" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen></iframe>
